description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Encroaching Presence]

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash All creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.
